caption: DAO - Create Transfer Proposal From DAO Treasury
doc: Create a proposal to transfer a batch of tokens to a wallet from the DAO treasury.

AMd.caption: DAO Address
AMd.doc: The contract address of the DAO being proposed to.
AMd.name: dao_address

AMf.caption: Token Address
AMf.doc: The ERC-20 governance token contract address that is being proposed to send.
AMf.name: token_address

AMl.caption: Amount Of Tokens
AMl.doc: The amount of the governance token we are wanting to mint.
AMl.name: amount

AMm.caption: Recipient
AMm.doc: The wallet address that will receive the tokens.
AMm.name: recipient
